item.title: Ontel Brella Shield Windshield Sun Shade by Arctic Air, Compact Design Pops Open Like an Umbrella and Fits Cars, Trucks & SUVs – One-Size (31×57) – As Seen on TV
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Effective Sun & Heat Protection – A fast and easy way to keep your car cool and comfortable in the hot sun, the Ontel BrellaShield Windshield Shade works just like an umbrella. Simply pop it open and expand to easily fit against your car’s windshieldFoldable Design For Easy Storage – ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.88 - $15.96
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:22:08 UTC – Details)



Effective Sun & Heat Protection – A fast and easy way to keep your car cool and comfortable in the hot sun, the Ontel BrellaShield Windshield Shade works just like an umbrella. Simply pop it open and expand to easily fit against your car’s windshield
Foldable Design For Easy Storage – When done using, just click the locking latch and pop the sun blocker shut into its compact size to easily store it in the dashboard, door panel or even under the seat without taking up any extra space
Sunshade Umbrella For Most Vehicles – The retractable shade collapses to less than 1 square foot instantly, and its universal size works equally well with the windshields of trucks, cars or even SUVs
Protect Your Car’s Interior – This car window cover is designed to block intense heat and harmful UV rays from the sun to help keep the inside of your car cooler, while preventing the car seats, upholstery and dashboard from fading and cracking
Privacy & Safety – The sun blocking screen provides shade to your car, truck, SUV or RV whether you are driving to work or halting mid-way on the road. It keeps your vehicle at a safe temperature while also maintaining complete privacy

3.5
Price: $19.88 - $15.96
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:22:08 UTC – Details)

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:10:49 UTC – Details)

To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness.

Date First Available ‏ : ‎ August 2, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ LMXXVJ
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09BNJHPYD

High Quality Material: This Women’s Jewellery Set is made of White Gold Plated ,Main stone is Created Blue Sapphire ,Side stone is White cubic zirconia. High Polished. Nickel-free, Hypoallergenic and Shiny Forever. Will not change the color, health and environmental protection.
Adjustable Size: Necklace length: 17.71″+1.97″, Bracelet Length: 7.09″+0.79″,Ring Size :Adjustable . We specially add extension chains for necklaces and bracelets, So that different sizes can be applied, Necklaces and Pendants can be separated, You can change the necklace you like.
Special Occasion Accessories:These wedding jewelry sets are Stunning and Elegant, Suitable for Wedding-Engagement-Party-Ball-Prom-Pageant-Cocktail-Date Night.Come with a nice gift box and a jewelry pouch, It’s a perfect gift for your Lovers, Mother, Daughter, Sister, Wife, Fiancee, Couple, Friends or Yourself on Anniversary-Valentines Day-Birthday-Christmas-Xmas Day.
Protection and Service: Please stay away from chemicals and keep the accessories dry. The product will always stay shiny. If you have any questions about this product, Please feel free to contact us. We will do our best to promise you a wonderful shopping experience.

About LMXXVJ jewelry

Meet you, Meet love.

An amazing encounter, a lifetime companion.

LMXXVJ has been focusing on fashion jewelry accessories, using high-quality cubic zirconia and semi-precious stones and exquisite craftsmanship to make exquisite jewelry. We hope that our jewelry will bring you good luck and a happy life.

All accessories are made of materials that are harmless to the human body to create a comfortable wearing experience for you.

For more earrings, ear clips, necklaces, bracelets, weddings, dance parties, anniversaries, Valentine’s Day jewelry sets, etc., please enter LMXXVJ STORE.

  • Bracelet Physical Picture

  • Pendant Physical Picture

  • Earrings Physical Picture

  • Adjustable Ring Physical Picture

Read more

Electroplating Process

The product uses five-layer electroplating platinum, which can better protect the health of the product and the user.

Bracelet Extension Clasp

All bracelets are equipped with a 0.79″ extension buckle, which can fit different sizes of wrists.

Necklace extension chain

Each necklace and pendant can be disassembled. You can change the necklace yourself, and the necklace adds a 1.97″ extension chain, which is convenient for users to match different clothes.

Read more

  • Every stone, Has every story.

LMXXVJ uses AAAAA grade cubic zirconia. Each stone is polished by experienced craftsmen. Each stone is specially selected to show the perfect cut surface, just to give you the best blessings.

  • Best Birthstone Gifts

Christmas, New Year’s Day, Women’s Day, Mother’s Day, Club Night, Valentine’s Day, Anniversaries, Birthdays, Events, Prom, Cocktail Party, Mitzvah, Prom, Festival, etc. Best for luxury jewelry with wedding dresses, evening gowns and skirts. Best birthstone gifts.

Read more

Diamond Accents

item.title: GZWHD Jewelry Set for Women Water Drop Cubic Zirconia Artificial Crystal Earrings Pendant Necklace Open Ring Tennis Bracelet Wedding Anniversary Birthday Engagement Gift for Bridesmaid Wife Girlfriend Friend
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Product Description GZWHD TO BE WITH YOU GZWHD is committed to creating elegant and delicate jewelry for women. It keeps up with fashion trends and transforms various trend elements into beautiful and practical jewelry to meet the diverse needs of modern women. Fashion design and high quality make GZWHD a ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $50.99 - $28.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:28:32 UTC – Details)

Product Description

GZWHD

TO BE WITH YOU

GZWHD is committed to creating elegant and delicate jewelry for women. It keeps up with fashion trends and transforms various trend elements into beautiful and practical jewelry to meet the diverse needs of modern women. Fashion design and high quality make GZWHD a popular brand.

Ring

Ring Size ：Adjustable Ring/Open Ring

Main Stone Size :10*14 mm

Stone Material:Cubic Zirconia

Side Stone Size：1 mm

Side Stone Quantity:18 Pieces

Earrings

Weight : 8.6 g

Main Stone Size :10*14 mm

Stone Material:Cubic Zirconia

Side Stone Size：1 mm

Side Stone Quantity:18*2= 36 Pieces

Necklace&Pendant

Weight : 4.5 g

Main Stone Size :12*16 mm

Stone Material:Cubic Zirconia

Side Stone Size：1.5 mm

Side Stone Quantity:18 Pieces

Chain Length ：

45+5 cm / 17.7″+2″

Bracelet

Weight : 18.2g

Main Stone Size :6*8mm

Main Stone Quantity：16 Pieces

Stone Material:Cubic Zirconia

Side Stone Size：2 mm

Side Stone Quantity:32 Pieces

bracelet Length ：18+3cm/7″+1″

A SPECIAL GIFT FOR A ROMANTIC MOMENT

This teardrop jewelry set is unique and elegant, it is an ideal gift for wife/lover/girlfriend/mother/daughter/friend/sister/bride/bridesmaid and yourself on Anniversaries/Valentine’s Day/Mother’s Day/Birthday/Wedding/Christmas/Thanksgiving Day.

Open/Adjustable Ring

The open ring size can be freely adjusted from size 6 to size 11, you can adjust it until it fits your finger perfectly.

Extended Bracelet

The length of the bracelet is 7 ”(main part) + 1” (extension section, detachable).You can make it fit your wrist by attaching and detaching the extension section freely.

Necklace Introduction

The length of the necklace is 17.7”+2”, This means you can choose any length between 17.7″-19.7″(45cm-50cm).This necklace is attached with a lobster clasp. It is separated from the pendant, and the pendant can be replaced freely.

Sealed Gift Box

We pack and ship each jewelry set in a sealed jewelry box. It is perfect as a gift to send directly to wife/lover/girlfriend/friend/sister/mom/bride/bridesmaid on anniversary/valentine’s day/birthday/mother’s day/Christmas day

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 3.15 x 1.97 x 1.02 inches; 1.59 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ January 4, 2022
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09PNBZTKP

MATERIAL: This jewelry set is platinum plated alloy, nickel-free, lead-free, non-allergic, and highly polished. The main stone is a 12mm*16mm (pendant) and 10mm*14mm (earrings and ring) waterdrop created-ruby, and the side stones are multiple inlaid round cubic zirconia. The bracelet contains 16 oval created-ruby and 32 round white cubic zirconia.
ABOUT SIZE: The size of the open ring can be adjusted from size6 to size11. The length of the necklace is 17.7”+2”(45cm+5cm). The necklace connected by lobster clasp,and it is separated from the pendant, and the pendant can be replaced freely. The length of the bracelet is 7 ”(main part) + 1” (extension section, detachable).
ITEMS YOU WILL GET: A ring, a pair of earrings, a pendant and necklace set, a bracelet, and a gift box.
QUALITY ASSURANCE: These jewelry are brand new, and they will be double-checked before sending, we will check every part of the whole set of jewelry to ensure that they are working properly and without any defects. We provide a 60-day unconditional refund service. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

GZWHD

TO BE WITH YOU

GZWHD is committed to creating elegant and delicate jewelry for women. It keeps up with fashion trends and transforms various trend elements into beautiful and practical jewelry to meet the diverse needs of modern women. Fashion design and high quality make GZWHD a popular brand.

From the brand

New Arrivals

Essential Tools

Basic Tools

Tool Sets

Almost every basic hand tools you need for work and DIY projects around the house.
Pliers are constructed by forged steel with heat treatment for strength and durability, hardened cutting edge for easy jobs. NOTICE: pliers are covered in anti-rust oil to prevent getting rusty, please wipe off the excess oil before using.
Durable 12-inch tool bag is constructed by 600D polyester fabric for durability, wide-open mouth for easy approach to the tools. 6 pockets outside and 6 pockets inside for well organization.
Includes slip joint pliers, groove joint pliers, adjustable wrench, long nose pliers, magnetic screwdriver holder, screwdriver bits, utility knife, tape measure.
Perfect for your home use or gifts.

FASTPRO 215-Piece Basic Home Tool Set

With the ideal to offer a complete and economic tool set for DIYer’s basic tool collection, the FASTPRO 215-piece Tool Set is set up to satisfy almost every requirement in the house.

This FASTPRO tool set is a useful tool set that worth to put in your garage/working site. Constructed from drop forged, heat treated steel with precision-machined jaws, the pliers are rugged and heavy-duty. Non-slip cushioned handle grips make the pliers comfortable to use. The 8″ adjustable wrench featured a precision machined screw for smooth jaw adjustment. The 18mm snap off utility knife with 8 break points cutting. The ergonomic handle screwdriver holder with 20-piece multi-purpose screwdriver bits for different needs. The tape measure is designed with both SAE and metric scales for easy reading. 6pc precision screwdrivers are designed for precision fastening task. At last, the 12-inch tool bag definitely a great bag that you may love to buy. Its zip-top wide mouth opening design enable the maximum storing capacity. All these futures make this tool set perfect for your daily life.

Holiday Gifts

Featured with 12-inch Tool Bag for easy traveling

Sturdy,handy, with wide open mouth top zipper, this tool bag is very convenient to carry tools for traveling.

1) 3-pockets in infront, 3-pockets in the back.

2) Inner there are also 6-pockets for well organzing.

3) Rubber padded bottom for durability.

4) The dimension of the tool bag is: 12 in. L X 8.5 in. W X 9 in. H. (Measured after fully opening)

Really a multiple functional daily bag.

A Complete Tool Set for Your Garage

Set includes:

(1) 8 oz fiber glass handle hammer

(6) Precision screwdriver set: PH000, PH00, PH0, Slotted 5/64”, 3/32”, 1/8”

(1) 3M/10FT Tape measure

(1) 6″ Long nose pliers

(1)6” Diagonal pliers

(1)8” groove-joint pliers

(16)Hex Key Set: SEA: 1/16, 5/64, 3/32, 1/8, 5/32, 3/16, 7/32, 1/4

(1) 8” Adjustable wrench

(1) Screwdriver holder

(20) Screwdriver bits set: slotted: 1/4”, 3/16”, 5/32”, Philips PH1, PH2, PH3, Star: T15, T20, Hex: 1/4, 1/8; Philips: PH1, PH2, Pozi: PZ1, PZ2, Torx: T15, T25, Slotted: 3/16”, 1/4”, Hex: H5/32, H1/4

(4)Screwdriver Set: PH2X4”, PH1X3”; Slotted: 1/4”X4”, 3/16”X3”

(1) 18mm snap-off knife

(10)18mm knife blades

(1) 100pc hardware kit

(1) 9in. Torpedo spirit level

(50)Cable ties

(1) 12-in Tool bag

These Mesh open ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $34.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:07:25 UTC – Details)


3 Pack: Men’s Active Athletic Basic Soft Mesh Open Bottom Sweatpants are comfortable, durable, and fashionable. These active athletic sweatpants are the perfect active open bottom sweatpants to wear to work out or lounge. A regular relax fit style will prevent bulkiness and provides a fashionable look. These Mesh open bottom sweatpants are the perfect Active pants for any activities such as running, jogging, tennis, skiing, snowboarding, skate boarding, football, soccer, and any outdoor related sports. Or these are the perfect loungewear pants to wear to class, run errands, or just around the house. Our Men’s athletic training sweatpants come in stylish colors, and styles while ensuring comfort and fashion. Our mesh active sweatpants have an adjustable drawstring to guarantee they stay in place throughout any workout activity delivery custom fit and feel. Count on our 3 Pack: Men’s Active Athletic Tech Mesh Open Bottom Sweatpants for total comfort, great quality, and amazing value for money. Click ‘Add to Cart’ now!
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 15.35 x 12.56 x 3.46 inches; 1.72 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ November 2, 2021
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09KX98113

Imported
Drawstring closure
Machine Wash
A relaxed straight leg and elastic, drawstring waistband bring lounge-ready style to these athletic sweatpants. Two deep side pockets.
Mesh athletic open bottom sweatpants perfect for both lounge and outdoor athletic activities,jogging, running, exercise, athletic, track, fitness or workout
Tech mesh wicks sweat away, keeping you cool and dry throughout your workout.
